attributes.cardDescription: Design your own app UI by describing what you want to build
attributes.prompt: Create a sprint-planning tool that lets users define backlogs, estimate stories, assign owners, and track burndown.

suggestions.cardDescription: Create a simple link-in-bio page with social media links and a bio section
Build a personal portfolio page with your background, skills, and contact information
Create a recipe management app with search, categories, and cooking instructions
Build a task management app with lists, priorities, and completion tracking
Design a showcase for creative work with galleries, project details, and contact forms
Build an event management app with calendar views, RSVP tracking, and event details
Create a workout tracking app with exercise logs, progress charts, and goal setting
Design a personal finance app with expense tracking, budget categories, and spending insights
